About us 

This application is a food application where you can interact with the application to order your food without interaction with waiter. 

Our restaurant was inaugrated in 2015 with it's first branch in mumbai. 

Later we have established our branches in Delhi,Chennai and Punjab. 

We have more than 10k customers in mumbai branch. 

To know more or to contact us please go to the contact section where you will find all contact details about us. 

				Thank You!
